page.title: 18RELIGION IN THE STURTON AREA
page.content:
THE AREA HAS{2 ANGLICAN CHURCHES.
THE VICAR OF{ALL SAINTS,BROXHOLME, RESIDES IN SAXILBY AND CONDUCTS MONTHLY SERVICES INCLUDING CHRISTMAS, EASTER AND HARVEST FESTIVAL.
WEEKLY SERVICES AND OTHER EVENTS ARE HELD IN{ST.HUGH'S CHURCH}IN STURTON. THE RECTOR LIVES IN STOW. { {THE METHODIST CHURCH}IS WELL ATTENDED WITH SEVERAL WEEKLY SERVICES. A SUNDAY SCHOOL IS HELD FOR THE CHILDREN AND THE WOMEN'S FELLOWSHIP GROUP MEETS FORTNIGHTLY. THE MINISTER, WHO RESIDES IN THE MANSE AT SAXILBY, IS ASSISTED BY LAY PREACHERS.
{BAPTISMS,WEDDINGS}AND{FUNERAL SERVICES ARE HELD IN ALL THREE PLACES.
